content: Add TypeInfo::from_schema builder method to result_types.rs

Move extract_reflect_types from type_discovery.rs to TypeInfo as private method
Move determine_supported_operations from type_discovery.rs to TypeInfo as private method
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt and fix errors
Move type category extraction from engine.rs to TypeInfo::extract_category
Move enum info extraction from engine.rs to TypeInfo::extract_enum_info
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt and fix errors
Move SchemaProcessor::build_mutation_paths to TypeInfo::build_mutation_paths
Move all mutation path helper methods from schema_processor.rs to TypeInfo
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt and fix errors
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix all clippy issues following warning rules
Update engine.rs build_type_info to use TypeInfo::from_schema
Update engine.rs generate_response to use TypeInfo builders
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt and fix errors
Remove all unused code from engine.rs
Delete schema_processor.rs file
Delete type_discovery.rs file
Update mod.rs to remove deleted module exports
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt and fix final errors
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix all remaining clippy issues
Run cargo nextest run
STOP if test failures - review with user
